data.actual_result: The category itself is still viewable but there are no channels inside.
data.expected_result: The Category should disappear due to it not containing any viewable channels.
data.short_description: If you mute all channels in a Category & Hide Muted Channels, the Category stays visible even though it's empty.
data.steps_to_repro: - Mute all Channels in a Category - Hide Muted Channels
